metadata.synopsis: One liner AD reaction after ending a combat with the portrait zombies, that spawn when attacking the portrait.
metadata.how_to_trigger: End a combat started by attacking the portrait with any weapon other than the candles of revocation.Location: CTY_Main_A -258; 34; -43

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Well - if I need a supply of undead warriors, I'll know where to find them.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: That's that, then. Is this some new art trend I've not been made aware of?
